def_cn: 麋鹿，驼鹿(一些英国人以 elk 称亚洲和欧洲的亚种，以 moose 称北美亚种)
def_en: An elk is a type of large deer. Elks have big, flat horns called antlers and are found in Northern Europe, Asia, and North America. Some British speakers use elk to refer to the European and Asian varieties of this animal, and moose to refer to the North American variety.
